Text: —And that sums up the situation.

How strange... I know he said would be back, but this
is worrying.

Our lord is in trouble, and we're here doing
nothing... Lady Alpha, is there no way we can go
find him?!
Calm down, Epsilon...

Two artifacts remain. If we use them, we may be able
to save Master Shadow. But—

He's the only one who knows what's on the other
side... It will be...undoubtedly dangerous...
So what're we gonna do?!

We all want to help Cid, so...let's decide who goes,
in a fair manner.
Yes...with Seven Shadows rock, paper, scissors!
I'll call it out. Is everyone ready?
Seven Shadows rock, paper, scissors! One, two—
Three!!!
...Looks like we have our two volunteers.

Lady Alpha and Delta... Please, bring Master Shadow
back!

Hmm... This gives me time...to figure out those
artifacts...

Well, there's not much else we can do. Please rest
assured we'll look after things here.

Yes, thank you, everyone. We will be back with Cid,
I promise.
See ya in a jiffy!

So this is the virtual space... It seems to be an
ordinary town. Delta, can you pick up anything?
*sniff sniff* I don't smell Boss man!

Which I suppose means...he hasn't come here yet.
Still, it would be foolish to act blindly.

Delta, let's start by gathering information on our
surroundings. We need to be aware so that—
Hey, do you have a second?
Um...pardon me?

Whoa, talk about NPCs with detailed models. I can see
the devs got really into making those black suits.

Cut it out, man. The AI in SLF is super good, so
talking like that might piss 'em off!

(A bird's head on a human body... It could be a rare
breed of therianthrope, or just some weirdo. Either
way, we should remain on guard...)
Huh? She's giving me some serious stink-eye.
See, I told ya so.

The birdy can talk?! Kinda weird, but I'm gonna catch
it anyway!

Ack! Wait, wait! We aren't bad guys, and feather-head
here is just a creep, not a monster. Don't worry!
Hey!

Anyway, we don't pose any danger to you. We only want
to talk, okay?

...Understood. Perhaps you'll answer our questions in
return?

Of course. Sounds like we have a deal, then. But
would you mind calming down your friend here?
Stay, Delta.
O-Okay!

Pro communicators are something else. She got us into
the dialogue phase, just like that.
Yeah, but I got labeled a creep in the process!

Whew, what a relief. Now we can finally get some info
about this place from the locals.

...Locals? But we're...never mind. We'll explain
that, too.

I see... And those artifacts are what brought you
here...
Sounds kinda like what happened to us, huh?

On the point of similar objects bringing us here,
yes.

Okay, so we know that this is someone's virtual space
and not a game. Now, how do we get out?
Whaaat?! We can't go home?!

Calm yourself. Laugus will surely have built in some
means of exit. We'll keep an eye out for clues as we
search for Cid.

Hey, how about we join forces? We'll help you look
for this Cid person, and you tell us if you find a
way out of this world.

I'd also like it we could pool our efforts while
we're stuck here. We'll lend a hand in any battles,
too. Well? I don't think it's a bad offer.

(The Shadow Garden in me says to avoid getting
involved with others, but...I don't think we have any
other choice, given the circumstances.)
Very well. Let's cooperate however we can.
Alright, it's a deal! Thanks, um...
Alpha.
And I'm Delta!

Alpha and Delta, got it! I'm Pencilgon! And here with
me are Stooge No. 1 and Stooge No. 2!

Wrong! I'm Sunraku, not a stooge, and definitely not
a creep!
I'm OiKatzo, and I'm no stooge either.
A bird and a male that's like a female.
Say, Alpha... Is your friend here okay?
What'd you say?! I hate people who say catty stuff!
Didn't take long for this relationship to go sour...
...Yes, it doesn't bode well.
